name: ΜΕΣΟΛΑΒΗΤΗΣ ΤΡΑΠΕΖΙΚΩΝ - ΕΠΕΝΔΥΤΙΚΩΝ ΥΠΗΡΕΣΙΩΝ
bossPosition: Hellenic Ombudsman for Banking - Investment Services
goal: Extra judicial resolution of disputes arising from the provision of banking and investment services to consumers or enterprises (with an annual turnover of less than one million euro).
euInitiatives:
Directive 2013/11/EU on consumer ADR
Regulation (EU) 524/2013 on consumer ODR
